homepage.intro: Hi, I’m a software engineer and a content creator posting regularly about my daily life and projects.
homepage.latestPostDescription: Is there such a thing as the perfect programmer? Maybe not, but there are traits we can all develop. This article explores them with humor and realism.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi! I'm Álvaro Alonso, a software engineer passionate about creating unique and functional digital experiences.
about.body: I love learning new tools and constantly improving my skills to deliver high-quality solutions. I always seek to combine creativity and efficiency in my projects.
